title: Aron Jaikles, the first to arrive in Chile, and early member of the Jewish community
Aron would play Telefunken with his grandchildren and would cheat and laugh uncontrollably when he beat them and took their money
Aron told the story that wooed his wife by lying to her that he was a millionaire
Aron was in textiles, also a 'semanalchik'
3 Sisters: Sarita, Betty, and Zulema, all big readers
Leike (Lea Serber) came from a town near Odessa
Abram came because of imminent Russian army conscription
No major antisemitism despite a Chilean Nazi Party, among the huge German population that Chile brought in starting in 1856
Ruby: My family tells me I'm being a Nazi for how much I hate the Nazis
Ruby's father left Russia because of Soviet oppression
